content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.databases WHERE name = 'demoDB')
    CREATE DATABASE demoDB
GO

USE demoDB
GO

-----

CREATE TABLE #employees
(
    empID INT NOT NULL,
    name NVARCHAR(50),
    country NVARCHAR(50),
    deptID INT NOT NULL
)

INSERT INTO #employees VALUES(1, 'Alexander', 'United States', 10)
INSERT INTO #employees VALUES(2, 'Olivia', 'Canada', 40)
INSERT INTO #employees VALUES(3, 'Benjamin', 'Brazil', 10)
INSERT INTO #employees VALUES(4, 'Emily', 'India', 30)
INSERT INTO #employees VALUES(5, 'Christopher', 'Australia', 20)
INSERT INTO #employees VALUES(6, 'Sophia', 'France', 10)
INSERT INTO #employees VALUES(7, 'William', 'Australia', 20)
INSERT INTO #employees VALUES(8, 'Ava', 'South Africa', 30)
INSERT INTO #employees VALUES(9, 'James', 'Mexico', 10)
INSERT INTO #employees VALUES(10, 'Mia', 'Russia', 40)

SELECT * FROM #employees WHERE country = 'Australia'
